Name: Anathema
Description: Inflicts the cursed status on one character.

Name: Bucket Splash
Description: Pulls forth a bucket full of water and splashes the opponent over a significant distance. Deals no damage. Makes opponent susceptible to ice magic.

Name: Twilight Cascade
Description: A wave of black magic, engulfing enemies and dealing moderate damage. Has a 20% chance to curse.

Name: Hollow
Description: Swap the attack/magic attack and defense/magic defense of one denigen.

Name: Resist Enchantment
Description: Block the effects of the next spell used on you.

Name: Study
Description: Gain a 75% resistance to the last spell or skill used on you.

Name: Resiviction
Description: Cast your previous spell at no cost, but has a chance to fail. Fail chance begins at 90% then scales off to 60% and caps at 30%.

Name: Bonecrush
Description: Hex one character, causing their bones to become incredibly brittle. They have a 50% chance to be hit by a critical on the next attack they take.

Name: Reaper Gaze
Description: Cast a hex on one character, petrifying them for 3-5 turns. Cannot be cast while blinded, and cannot be cast on the blind.
